description: Meet new people around you and find friends with Sisfu. Like their profile photos, send messages. Chat with video or voice and get to know yourself better without sharing your phone number. Find the right love or friend you are looking for.   The Powerful Features of Sisfu;   - By the Sisfus location feature, meet people in your near circle.  - With advanced matching feature search by gender, location, photo, age range and distance.  - Video or voice chat without sharing your phone number.  - Send unlimited messages with Sisfu Plus.  - Like their profile photos.  - Get informed when your profile photo get likes.  - Navigate unlimitedly among Profiles, add members you like to your favorites.  - Block people you do not want.  - Start your free subscription with Facebook, Google Plus, email address or phone number.  - Always use Sisfu without ads.   Go beyond classic dating methods. To expand your social circle, like their profile photos, send a message, chat. Find new people in places you travel through by the Sisfus location feature. Talk to them unlimitedly and talk to them on the phone without sharing your phone number, get to know them better with video chat.   For your questions and comments, you can send us an e-mail with the following address:  support@sisfu.com
